old:
ふー、いいお湯！
のぼせないようにしないとねぇ
column2:
Whew, nice hot water!
I'll have to try not to get bloated!
speaker: Hannah

old:
レスタニアハーブの爽やかな香り
大好きなのよね
column2:
The refreshing scent of Lestania Herb,
I simply love it.
speaker: Hannah

old:
普段使いにはここで十分よ
たまにはもっといいお湯に行きたいけどね
column2: For everyday use, here is more than enough. But occasionally, I would like to go to a place with even better hot water.
speaker: Hannah
